shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the AI voice tuner feature.
Enables or disables the AI tuner feature.
Enables or disables the AI tuner feature.
Enables or disables the AI tuner feature.

p.codeblock: abstract enableVoiceAITuner(enabled: boolean, type: VoiceAiTunerType): number;
abstract enableVoiceAITuner(enabled: boolean, type: VoiceAiTunerType): number;
Future<void> enableVoiceAITuner( {required bool enabled, required VoiceAiTunerType type});
public abstract int EnableVoiceAITuner(bool enabled, VOICE_AI_TUNER_TYPE type);

section.p: The AI voice tuner feature enhances voice quality and adjusts voice tone styles.
The AI tuner feature enhances voice quality and adjusts voice tone style.
The AI tuner feature enhances audio quality and adjusts voice tone style.
The AI tuner feature enhances voice quality and adjusts voice tone style.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: Social and entertainment scenarios with high audio quality requirements, such as online karaoke, online podcasts, and live shows.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining the channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the AI voice tuner feature:
: Enable the AI voice tuner.
: (Default) Disable the AI voice tuner.

Whether to enable the AI tuner feature:
: Enable the AI tuner feature.
: (Default) Disable the AI tuner feature.

Whether to enable the AI tuner feature:
: Enable the AI tuner feature.
: (default) Disable the AI tuner feature.

Whether to enable the AI tuner feature:
: Enable the AI tuner feature.
: (Default) Disable the AI tuner feature.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
